metadata.dc:author: Trujillo, R
Bueno, M
Pérez Acosta, J
Cortabarría, C
metadata.dc:description: An initial statistical study on the incidence of oncologic pathology during infancy carried out in the Pediatric Department of the University of La Laguna, is presented. They study includes 33 tumors which have been collected over a period of 3.5 years.
metadata.dc:title: Nuestra experiencia en oncología pediátrica. Primer estudio estadístico
[Our experience in pediatric oncology (author's transl)].
